35M followers, so much signal in the comments, 10k, 20k, 70k comments. I've spoken to my friend at ByteDance - longshot but we could ask if you guys can't scrape.  Announced 8/1 Rolling out TikTok Footnotes in the US
Author: Adam Presser, Head of Operations and Trust & Safety

Earlier this year we announced the pilot of Footnotes, a new feature that will help bring more context to content on TikTok. Footnotes draws on the collective knowledge of the TikTok community by allowing people to add relevant information to content on our platform. Starting today, U.S. users in the Footnotes pilot program can start to write and rate footnotes on short videos, and our U.S. community will begin to see the ones rated as helpful - and rate them, too.

What are Footnotes?

Footnotes bring additional written context to videos. A footnote might share a researcher's view on a complex STEM-related topic, while  https://newsroom.tiktok.com/en-us/rolling-out-tiktok-footnotes-in-the-us.
